attributes.action: Don't destroy the wide range of adult further education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have some fantastic colleges doing day and evening classes for adults needing or wanting further education. These fulfil a great need for learning new skills and meeting other people. I have retrained for 2 new careers during my life due to these, and gone on to university. And seen many people drag themselves through very difficult parts of their lives, with these courses giving them something to achieve at. They are great places for young and old. Often the old are ignored these days, and this is part of our communities.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
